docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THERE is a long list of horror stories connected with the consumption of sugar: hyperactivity in children; criminal behavior in adults; diabetes; elevated cholesterol. There is little good scientific evidence that sugar causes these conditions, but under certain circumstances it is thought to aggravate them.
